project.Title: Spartan (Class Mod)
project.ItemDescription:
V2.7
[h1]July 2019 Update[/h1] *NEW! Korean(A) Translation by [b]Nickel[/b]. Thank you! *NEW! Compatible with [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1779509342][b]Pets (Trinkets + Monster Mod)[/b][/url] Details below.
[h1]Class Description[/h1] A versatile defensive and support soldier class, the Spartan was raised to be loyal to his state military. He is well educated and instilled with a mantra of duty, discipline, and endurance. Due to his experience with contracts, property deeds, and maps, he can hold 3 extra deeds per inventory slot. He's willing to die to protect his group.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/fFzA3N3.png[/img]
[h1]Combat Skills[/h1] Spear Lance Shield Slam Into the Fray Work Together Backline Tactics Mysterious Viscous Liquid Phalanx
Some of his skills grow in reach, duration, or starting location with practice.
[h1]Camping Skills[/h1] Candle for Artemis Hearty Meal Night Watch Repack the Supplies
[h1]Pets Compatible[/h1] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1779509342][img]https://i.imgur.com/Cb2vcbh.jpg[/img][/url] NOW LIVE! Help find "Warden", the Spartan's Pet Armadillo who was taken by the Pet Patrol in the [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1779509342][b]Pets (Trinkets + Monster Mod)[/b][/url]. Optional mod.
[h1]A Spider Hunter[/h1] A Spartan's spear is especially effective against Spiders found in the [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1717651804][b]Spider Nests 2 (Monster Mod)[/b][/url]. The Skill "Into the Fray" receives +DMG +ACC +CRIT to pierce 8-legged freaks. Optional mod. [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1717651804][img]https://i.imgur.com/A1uo7iU.jpg[/img][/url]
[h1]Herbs of the Wild Compatible[/h1] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1390782905&searchtext=herbs+of+the+wild][img]https://i.imgur.com/Lhn3Whb.jpg[/img][/url] A Spartan's military training also allows him to find a few helpful natural supplies when using Carnifex's [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1390782905&searchtext=herbs+of+the+wild][b]Herbs of the Wild Resource Mod[/b][/url] which is recommended (and fun!) but is NOT required. Chance to trigger while interacting with curios or while searching after a battle. Spartans are ONLY trained to identify fruit, flowers, mushrooms, or wood in certain locations. NOTE: When loading mods, just place HotW Resource Mod ABOVE/ON TOP OF all participating Class Mods. [spoiler]Slim chance to find Herbal Trinkets in Cove[/spoiler]
[h1]Trinkets[/h1] Bracer of Speed Legion Necklace Mysterious Powder Centurion Cloak Page from Ancient Warfare Book Ares Spear, Set Ares Shield, Set Bioluminescent Shield, COM Aged Corinthian Helm, CC Set Winged-Horse Coin, CC Set Leonidas' Head, Collector
[h1]Roles[/h1] Defensive, Marking, Low Bleed, Minor Heal, Stunner
[h1]Other[/h1] 12 Color/Helmet/Armor Variations [6 light armor (A-F) and 6 full body armor (G-L)] Custom sounds Town Event Custom Virtue Protectorate Custom Heirloom Inventory Stack Limit (Deeds 9) New Quirks +Arterial Authority -Royal Hemophilia
[h1]Languages[/h1] English, Chinese(S), Korean(A) Other languages show English strings
[h1]Compatibility[/h1] Shieldbreaker not required. Color of Madness Yes Crimson Court Yes [note: Should work okay without DLCs, since the trinkets are segregated]
[h1]Playstyle[/h1] Spartan can be used in a variety of ways, with some longer battles and an element of chance too. Can fit into a variety of party configurations, including Mark (Arbalest, Bounty Hunter), Bleed (Houndmaster, Flagellant) and Shuffle (Grave Robber, Highwayman, Thrall) teams. He gets better at some skills the more he progresses, but some skills move him around. He is more defensive and support. He has a very weak, risky heal. Willing to sacrifice himself (lower death blow resist). Sometimes critical hits will relieve a little group stress. Defensive in nature with helpful camping skills.
[h1]Thanks[/h1] JAN 2019 Update: 6 new breastplate designs! The #1 top request! Awesome artwork by [b]Kahvipannu![/b] who gave permission for a full class! Some icons adapted from other artwork and trinkets. If you don't want a custom class, play with original skin-only version at https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1513257858 or the armoed skin-only version at https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1590465899
*Thanks to DD Modding community. I have greatly enjoyed this game with their amazing contributions, including Exaelus, Hellintz, Nodappjung, CarnifeX, Clair de Lune, ActionJack, Maester Silvio, Poljanan, Mhnlo, Tasty, Marvin Seo + O'Nightmare! *Chinese(S) Translation by [b]小凯先生[/b]! *Korean(A) Translation by [b]Nickel[/b]!
